properties.description: Cornwall Area: Penwith Hub Area: Nr. Penzance Address: St Piran's Hall (Goldsithney), South Road, Goldsithney, Nr. Penzance, Cornwall, TR20 9LF Opening Times: Open 365 days a year 8:00am to 23:00 hrs Activities Offered: Regular activities: Monday: Parkinson's Exercise - 11:00 to 13:00 Pilates - 9:15 to 10:15 Rock Choir - 14:00 to 16:00 Boogie Bounce - 17:45 to 19:45 Badminton - 20:00 to 21:30 Painting - 13:00 to 15:00 Tuesday: Chair Fit - 11:00 to 12:00 Parkinson's Indoor Bowling - 14:00 to 16:00 Bingo - 14:00 to 16:00 Sound Bath - 10:00 to 11:30 Never Alone - 10:00 to 11:30 Grapplers (Brazillian Tai Kwon Do) 17:30 to 19:00 Badminton - 19:00 to 21:30 St John's - 19:30 to 21:30 Wednesday: Gaitsmart - 9:00 to 16:00 Move It or Lose It - 10:30 - 11:30 Luminescence Yoga -10:00 to 11:30 Memory Cafe - 13:00 to 15:00 Knit and Natter - 14:00 to 16:00 Zumba - 18:15 to 19:15 Dances around the world - 19:00 to 21:00 Badminton - 19:30 to 20.30 Thursday: West Kernow Embroidery - 10:00 to 15:00 Sing & Sign (Baby Development) - 9:30 to 12:30 Beginners Pilates - 17:15 to 18.15 Advanced Pilates - 18:30 to 19:30 Grapplers - 18:00 to 20:00 Badminton - 20:00 to 21:00 Penryn Photographic Group - 19:00 to 21:00 Friday: Senior Table Tennis - 9:00 to 12:00 Painting - 13:00 to 16:00 Peranuthoe W.I. - 13:30 to 16:30 M.S. Indoor Bowling - 13:30 to 16:00 Junior Table Tennis - 17:30 to 18:30 Gateway Club - 18:30 to 21:30 Saturday: Grapplers - 8:00 to 10:00 Yoga - 9:30 to 10:30 Lace and Thread - 10:00 to 16:00 Sunday: Lace and Thread - 10:00 to 16:00 FND Craft Event - 10:00 to 15:00 Village Market - 11:00 to 14:00 Activities - General (Please note that some activities operate weekly, some fortnightly, some monthly and some like the first Sat and the last Sunday of the Month. The Hall has 3 Active Areas - Main Hall, Trevean Room & Perran Room. All areas are on ground level. There is also a Disabled toilet. There is a fully equipped Kitchen and Servery Area. Perranuthoe Parish Council have an Office within the building as well as holding their monthly meetings. The Car Park can accomodate approx. 26 Cars with designated disabled parking. The InPost facility is situated at the front of the building. The adjoining Recreation ground has a fenced children's Play Area, a Green Gym, Football Goals, Basketball Hoop, etc. Public Contact Name: Andy Moore - Chairman Brian Baumber - Lettings Officer Giles Harper - Treasurer Charity No. 300588 Public Phone: 07436 196265 Public Email: stpiranshallgoldsithney@gmail.com Notes: https://www.stpiranshall.com/calendar Health Checks: Pain or Cancer Café: Diabetes Support: Falls or Balance: Cardio or Respiratory Groups: Dementia Support: Physical Activity: Yes Hospital Discharge: Growing and Cooking: Transport Provision: Hub Partnership: Yes Carer Support: Outreach with Neighbourhoods: Yes Enhanced PCN Relationship: Meals on Wheels: Debt or Legal Advice: Talking Therapies: Vaccination Clinics: Digital Offer: Children, Young People and Family Hubs: Other Additional Service (Specify): ﻿ICA Area: West unnamed (1): unnamed (2):
